news.title: Amazon Web Services outage hits major websites: What we know so far as recovery begins
news.summary: AWS, which suffered a major outage early Monday, is the leading provider of cloud infrastructure technology. It accounts for about a third of the market.

news.title: White House Economic Advisor Hassett says shutdown could end this week
news.summary: Top White House economic advisor Kevin Hassett predicted that the government shutdown is "likely to end sometime this week" Hassett said the shutdown is likely to end "this week"

news.title: Trump calls for Ukraine to be carved up with Russia after tense meeting with Zelenskyy
news.summary: Trump appears to be seesawing in his support for Ukraine, following his phone call with President Vladmir Putin last Thursday. Trump appears to have seesawed in his supports for Ukraine after his phonecall with President Vladimir Putin.

news.title: Cost and chaos continue to test resiliency of U.S. auto industry
news.summary: Auto executives, insiders and analysts told CNBC things aren't as bad as they once feared. Some of the most dire predictions haven't come to pass.

news.title: Rare earths make gains in premarket trading amid battle to beat China’s dominance
news.summary: Shares of U.S.-listed companies related to the rare earth supply chain climbed in premarket trading on Monday. Shares of companies in the supply chain are related to rare earths, such as lithium, cobalt and rare earth oxide.

news.title: It’s a ‘historically opportunistic’ time for stock picking, says Morgan Stanley. Here are the bank’s picks.
news.summary: Morgan Stanley says it's a prime time to pick stocks right now. The bank has some ideas on how to invest in the right stocks at the right time.

news.title: ‘My family is having a crisis’: My mom added my brother to her mortgage. He stopped paying. How does she get him off it?
news.summary: “He refuses to take their names off the mortgage without getting paid,” says a source close to the family. “He doesn’t want to pay them. He wants them to get paid.”

news.title: ‘A friend calls it the everything bubble’: Why do so many economists fear a 1929-style crash?
news.summary: We have faced fears, for more than 10 years, that the market is going to experience the kind of crash not seen in nearly a century.

news.title: With Apple stock near a record high as earnings loom, here’s the options trade to make
news.summary: The iPhone maker’s shares tend to rise in the last 3 months of the year, says Evercore. Evercore: iPhone maker's share price tends to increase in last three months of year.

news.title: AstraZeneca hails major breakthroughs with breast-cancer drugs
news.summary: An executive at AstraZeneca says breast-cancer drugs that the company highlighted at an industry conference could represent $10 billion worth of company sales in five years' time.
